head.title: Technology Briefing | Biotechnology: Climate Exchange Postpones Trading Date

hedline.hl1: Technology Briefing | Biotechnology: Climate Exchange Postpones Trading Date

abstract.p: Chicago Climate Exchange, which aims to create public market for trading rights to emit greenhouse gases, postpones its starting date for trading until Dec 12 (S)

block.p: The Chicago Climate Exchange, which aims to create a public market for trading rights to emit greenhouse gases, has postponed its starting date for trading until Dec. 12, according to Richard L. Sandor, its chairman and chief executive. The climate exchange had said it would start trading by the end of this week when it held an auction of emissions credits a month ago to help establish opening prices.

The Chicago Climate Exchange, which aims to create a public market for trading rights to emit greenhouse gases, has postponed its starting date for trading until Dec. 12, according to Richard L. Sandor, its chairman and chief executive. The climate exchange had said it would start trading by the end of this week when it held an auction of emissions credits a month ago to help establish opening prices.
